controllers

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.LoginController

  • public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will be used as a login controller. There will be a 1:1 relation between the amount of logged in users and the amount of controllers. Each logincontroller will remember what user they logged in.
